10.text: I’ve just come out of the most wonderful two and a half hours in the Sam Wannamaker Playhouse.

15.text: If you haven’t been there, do rush to get to it.

21.text: It was unexpectedly delightful. The theatre is like a jewel.

27.text: It made it timeless in a way, hearing new poetry and old poetry,

33.text: and yet being in such a historical but new playhouse it really made a big difference to the experience and

38.text: I don’t think it’d be the same being anywhere else.

42.text: You got a real sense of how deeply engaged the musician was with the music.

46.text: You could see his expressions changing.

49.text: It was a really good experience hearing new poetry fresh on the night

52.text: night that nobody had heard before.

54.text: I thought that was really exciting.

58.text: I love the little touches of gold and the luminosity

61.text: It really gives you a proper historical frisson to be inside.

68.text: It’s like being in another century.

70.text: I’ve never been in another space quite like it.
